trans-unit.source: Specifies the Speech Synthesis Markup Language (SSML) action to be taken in rendering a given <xref uid="langword_csharp_TextFragment" name="TextFragment" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Specifica l'azione di riconoscimento vocale sintesi Markup Language (SSML) da eseguire nel rendering in un determinato <xref uid="langword_csharp_TextFragment" name="TextFragment" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: TtsEngineAction represents requests for servicing a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>.
trans-unit.target: TtsEngineAction rappresenta le richieste per la manutenzione del <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>

trans-unit.source: The actions correspond closely to elements in the SSML specification and are implemented on the text returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextToSpeak%2A> property on a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>.
trans-unit.target: Le azioni corrispondono agli elementi nella specifica SSML e sono implementate nel testo restituito dalla <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextToSpeak%2A>proprietà in un <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextToSpeak%2A>

trans-unit.source: The TtsEngineAction value associated with a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> is returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Il valore di TtsEngineAction associato a un <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>restituito dal <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>

trans-unit.source: Processing of the TtsEngineAction value returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> property is handled by a speech synthesizes implementation of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A> method on a class derived from <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml>.
trans-unit.target: L'elaborazione del valore TtsEngineAction restituito dal <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A>proprietà viene gestita da un riconoscimento vocale sintetizza l'implementazione del <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A>metodo in una classe derivata da <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A>

trans-unit.source: Indicates that <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment"></xref> is to be used as the contents of a bookmark.
trans-unit.target: Indica che <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment"> </xref> deve essere utilizzato come il contenuto di un segnalibro.

trans-unit.source: Corresponds to the `<mark>` XML tag in the SSML specification.
trans-unit.target: Corrisponde al `<mark>` (tag XML) nella specifica SSML.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that no action has been determined from SSML input.
trans-unit.target: Indica che è non stata determinata dall'input SSML alcuna azione.

trans-unit.source: The associated <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> is an unknown XML tag not part of the SSML standard.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto associato <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>è un tag XML sconosciuto non fa parte dello standard SSML.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>

trans-unit.source: This input that may be interpreted or ignored by at the discretion of a synthesis engine.
trans-unit.target: L'input che può essere interpretato o ignorato a discrezione del motore di sintesi.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Requests that input <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment"></xref> text be interpreted as phonemes.
trans-unit.target: Le richieste di input <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment"> </xref> testo essere interpretato come fonemi.

trans-unit.source: Exact pronunciation is specified by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Phoneme%2A> member of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> object returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> property on <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instances.
trans-unit.target: Pronuncia esatto specificata dal <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Phoneme%2A>appartenente il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>oggetto restituito dal <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A>proprietà <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>istanze.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Phoneme%2A>

trans-unit.source: Corresponds to the `<Phoneme>` XML tag in the SSML specification.
trans-unit.target: Corrisponde al `<Phoneme>` (tag XML) nella specifica SSML.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that a <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment"></xref> contains no text to be rendered as speech.
trans-unit.target: Indica che un <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment"> </xref> non contiene testo deve essere eseguito come riconoscimento vocale.

trans-unit.source: Duration of the silence is specified by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Duration%2A> member of the he <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> object returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> property on <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instances.
trans-unit.target: Durata di inattività specificata da di <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Duration%2A>appartenente he <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>oggetto restituito dal <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A>proprietà <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>istanze.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Duration%2A>

trans-unit.source: Corresponds to the `<Silence>` XML tag in the SSML specification.
trans-unit.target: Corrisponde al `<Silence>` (tag XML) nella specifica SSML.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Requests that the associated <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment"></xref> should be processed and spoken.
trans-unit.target: Richiede che l'oggetto associato <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment"> </xref> deve essere elaborato e letto.

trans-unit.source: This is the default value of TtsEngineAction for a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>, Corresponds to the `<speak>` XML tag in the SSML specification
trans-unit.target: Questo è il valore predefinito di TtsEngineAction per un <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>, corrisponde al `<speak>` (tag XML) nella specifica SSML</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that text values provided by a <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment"></xref> through its <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextToSpeak*> property are to be synthesize as individual characters.
trans-unit.target: Indica che i valori di testo fornito da un <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment"> </xref> tramite il relativo <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextToSpeak*>proprietà devono essere sintetizzare come singoli caratteri.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextToSpeak*>

trans-unit.source: This rendering includes punctuation, other than white space, as well as alphanumeric text.
trans-unit.target: Il rendering include segni di punteggiatura, diversi da spazi vuoti, come testo alfanumerici.

trans-unit.source: For example thee associated text fragment "word!"
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio tre associato un frammento di testo "word"!

trans-unit.source: should be synthsized into "w o r d exclamation point".
trans-unit.target: deve essere synthsized in "w o r punto esclamativo d".

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Indicates state of paragraph.
trans-unit.target: Indica lo stato di paragrafo.

trans-unit.source:
Corresponds to the `

` XML tag in the SSML specification
trans-unit.target:
Corrisponde al `

` (tag XML) nella specifica SSML

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Indicates start of sentence.
trans-unit.target: Indica l'inizio della frase.

trans-unit.source: Corresponds to the `<s>` XML tag in the SSML specification
trans-unit.target: Corrisponde al `<s>` (tag XML) nella specifica SSML

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.
